name: Herding Cats on Rollerskates
description:
Herding Cats on Rollerskates!

HCOR is my entry to LD40, this jam marks my first ever Ludum Dare; I've wanted to participate for the past 5 years but never had the time or just damn well forgotten. Had a fantastic time making this game and hope it drives people as insane as i've wished for!

Instructions:

Click and Drag /Tap and drag.

Supports Multitouch on Mobile.
